person.persName: Thomas E. Grier (Mason County, KY, grocery clerk & Ohio soldier)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, and Aberdeen, Ohio, clerk and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of W. D. Grier and Ruth Grier. Student in Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in Aberdeen, Ohio, in 1860. Store clerk to James C. Brookover in Mason County in 1861. Served in the 70th Ohio Volunteer Infantry Regiment as a private and sergeant from October 26, 1862, to November 28, 1864, when he died of wounds received in battle in Atlanta, Georgia, on August 17, 1864.
